item.title: Calculating e, using matlab (how to get answer in double type)
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

i am using Euler’s way, i have to calculate “e”=2.718281828.

my script(see below) works but it only prints up to 4 decimal places, i have no idea why, help me please, thank you in advance.

[code]
function [eis] = euler1(in)
c=in-1;

while c>=1,

if c == double(in-1),
    Q = double(c+(c/in));
end

Q= double(c + (c/Q));

alpha = double(Q);
c=c-1;

end
eis = 2+ 1/(double(alpha));[/code]

my value is 2.718 for any value of in, example

output window.

[eis]=euler1(3)
eis = 2.718
[eis]=euler1(200)
eis = 2.718

Read full topic
item.source: Calculating e, using matlab (how to get answer in double type)
